data.name: Left Stranded
data.detailed_description:
Join Discord


http://discord.gg/qC89f3J6T2


About the Game

Left Stranded is a factory and base building game set in a 2D procedurally generated world. You are a scientist sent to an unknown planet to harvest resources, build production lines and setup the foundation for further colonization.

You will be mining resources, craft conveyor belts, smelters, assemblers, trains, pipes and research new technologies to build more complex machines and devices to generate massive factories.

Build

Build your factory in a procedurally generated world, full of really useful natural resources that can be smelted and refined to build very complex production lines.

Automate

Build your factory using a mix of conveyor belts, trains and pipes to supply your needs. Make sure to move goods and liquids as fast as possible to increase production speed.

Features

  • Open world: Explore a huge procedurally generated world (40Km2).
  • Factory building: Generate massive factories to automate your production and achieve maximum throughput.
  • Base building: Build your own base in any way you want, you can build a big control base or even a tiny shelter to survive during the freezing nights.
  • Vehicles: Travel the world at speed using tracks, transportation pads and trains.

data.short_description: Left Stranded is a factory and a base building game set in a 2D procedurally generated world.You are a scientist sent to an unknown planet to harvest resources, build production lines and setup the foundation for further colonization.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11, 10, 8, 7
  • Processor: Dual core 3Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.1 capable GPU with 512 MB VRAM - GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 4850 or Intel HD Graphics 5500
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Normal sprite resolution, Low quality compression, 1080p resolution
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11, 10, 8, 7
  • Processor: Quad core 3GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 capable GPU with 2 GB VRAM - GeForce GTX 750 Ti, Radeon R7 360
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 11 capable GPU with 2 GB VRAM - GeForce GTX 750 Ti, Radeon R7 360
